title: Launcher Error
body: Uh.... Can't get the game to launch. I recently switched routers if that changes anything. It says "The Application was unable to start correctly (0xc0000142). Click OK to close the application."

replies.body: When you say you can't get the game to launch, do you mean when you're loading a match or elsewhere?  Are there any other errors like a bugsplat?  Let me know!

The error occurs when I first move to launch League of Legends. Upon trying to load both the Beta client and the Legacy client, both end up crashing/not loading. I get the error specifically when I use the Legacy Client and press the 'Play' button. 

The Alpha client on the other hand simply shows the League of Legends icon, and then never loads. 

I've restarted the computer and reinstalled league but cannot get past this error for some reason. I've checked all permissions but am simply stumped!

You're on the right track about permissions, because it does sound like something is preventing the client from opening.  I'm not sure what you've done specifically, but I suggest going over every single step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.  Hope it helps!
